main event: A bright, glowing object was reported moving rapidly over New York City on July 7, 1952.
interesting points: The object appeared metallic in nature and was performing unusual maneuvers, accelerating and decelerating rapidly.
No sound was heard associated with the object.
The case was investigated by Project Blue Book personnel, but no definite conclusions could be drawn regarding the nature or origin of the observed object.
The case is classified as Unidentified.
The report includes two black and white photographs that appear to show unexplained bright objects or formations in the night sky.
photographs: yes, two black and white photographs are included in the report
